channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Download Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Download Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-8071|2024-08-04T21:10:32.494Z -- adobe -- adobe%20download%20manager
item.description: Adobe Download Manager versions 2.0.0.363 have an insecure file permissions vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2020-9688|2024-08-04T10:34:39.920Z -- adobe -- adobe%20download%20manager
item.description: Adobe Download Manager version 2.0.0.518 have a command injection vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
